response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This exceptional item carries a unique value that resonates with its high-quality materials and innovative features. Given its rarity and exclusivity, I believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering all these factors, I am extending an exclusive offer to you for $15,000. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the prestige and benefits associated with owning this remarkable product. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or making this purchase.", "product_price": 15000}
